channel.title: R on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in R on A Hugo website

item.title: Hygienic city study proposal (brief)
item.description: Motivation A city’s hygiene, which closely related to the local governance, can positively or negatively influence the health of citizens. The influence become especially prominent when we come to the infectious disease outbreak. The assessment of national hygienic city has a comprehensive guideline on solid waste management, waste water management, coverage of green area and green area per capital, Air Pollution Index (API) or Air Quality index (AQI) and other seven items.

item.title: SER
item.description: knitr::include_graphics('/image/ser1.pdf', error = FALSE) Figure 1: caption knitr::include_graphics(“/img/test.jpg”, error = FALSE) ```

item.title: Clinical notes: Health Disparities
item.description: People in low-socioeconomic status are at a high risk of diseases and death. I saw two patients both diagnosed with intracranial tuberculoma. One of them was a middle-aged and high-income man. He lived in a VIP ward for three months. He even wanted to live in the ward for several more days, after the doctors said that he is fully recovered. The other one is a 19-year-old rural boy, he came to city alone for a higher salary work.

item.title: An human experiment: How does pescetarian diet affect health
item.description: Introduction To evaluate the effect the health effect of pescetarian diet, an two-month’s intervention study was conducted on a 19-year-old female, from April, 6th to July 12th, in 2019. Food frequency questionnaire were answered by the participant at baseline. Blood glucose, hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c), blood urea nitrogen (BUN), high-density lipoprotein (HDL), low-density lipoprotein (LDL), height and body weight were measured at both baseline and follow-up. Limitations The sample size is only one, because the author fail to find more volunteer to participate in this study.

item.title: R visualization of epidemic in United States
item.description: Epidemic in United States On the another side of the world, however, the disease has rapidly transmitted through the world, especailly United States. As compare to China, it does not implement lockdown and social distancing policy at the early stage of the epidemic. But it’s true that, US’s mass screening and medical system performance has shown the its amazing health-care resources, which is shown in my previous assignment.

item.title: Clinical notes: A schizophrenia patient
item.description: One good-weather afternoon when I sit in the public office and read a medical book sleepily. There is a new patient just accepted by our department. It’s a patient with schizophrenia, with liver cirrhosis, and were sent to hospital by apsychia. Considering schizophrenia, he was put in a separate and isolated ward. I was just a student, and what I can do is only to go to ask patient’s history.
